name: Drone-based Pizza delivery service

name: [ARO] MP and Dynamics
description: Coordinated Dual-Arm Manipulation for Object Transport Using the Nextage Robot project. experiment and develop motion planning and dynamics controlling computational framework for a robot manipulation (grabing cube).

name: RecyclED

name: Robotics Project

description: Experimental research project. Developed a robot manipulation system to prove importance of tackling fundamental problems in robotics to challenge dexterity of robot manipulation.
